meanings.definition: The act of engaging in illegal activities for profit.
meanings.sent1: Racketeering can lead to serious consequences.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested a group involved in racketeering.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character was caught racketeering for candy.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a mask for his racketeering ways.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the dark world of racketeering vividly.

meanings.definition: A criminal organization involved in illegal activities.
meanings.sent1: The racketeering group operated in secrecy.
meanings.sent2: People were afraid of the powerful racketeering syndicate.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the zoo formed a racketeering gang for bananas.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered like a racketeering empire.
meanings.sent5: The news exposed the inner workings of the racketeering ring.

meanings.definition: The practice of obtaining money through dishonest or fraudulent means.
meanings.sent1: Racketeering can harm both individuals and businesses.
meanings.sent2: The businessman was involved in racketeering schemes.
meanings.sent3: The cat was caught racketeering treats from the pantry.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a cover for her racketeering intentions.
meanings.sent5: The novel described the world of racketeering in great detail.
